text: Don Diego and Pelagia () is a 1928 Soviet silent comedy drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Дон Диего и ПелагеяДон Диего и Пелагея (1927) It stars Mariya Blyumental-Tamarina, Anatoliy Bykov, and Vladimir Mikhaylov. ==Actors== * Mariya Blyumental-Tamarina as Pelageya Diomina * Anatoliy Bykov as 'Don Diego', station master * Vladimir Mikhaylov as Pelageya's husband * I. Levkoyeva as Natasha * Ivan Yudin as Misha * Vladimir Popov as Miroshka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1928 drama movies Category:1928 comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Don Diego and Pelagia
